name: admin-only.toml

guard.name: Admin Access
guard.description: Allows access only to authenticated administrators

rawContent:
# Admin Only Guard
# Restricts access to administrators

[guard]
id = "admin-only"
name = "Admin Access"
description = "Allows access only to authenticated administrators"

[access]
authenticated = true
roles = ["eldercare-admin"]

[redirect]
unauthenticated = "/login"
unauthorized = "/unauthorized"

[relations]
roles = ["eldercare-admin"]
routes = ["admin-dashboard", "admin-orders", "admin-specialists", "specialist-detail", "order-assignment"]
